title: Monkey

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a target to "see," and a target to "do."

fields.name: Attributues:
fields.value:
- The player you "see" will be roleblocked, and you will use their night ability on the target you choose to "do."
- You will visit both players, and be affected by rampaging abilities if one would target either player.
- Your ability will fail if your target must target multiple players, but you will not be notified of this.
- If your "see" target can kill, your attack value will always be Basic.

desc:
Post 233
*Let's be honest--you have no idea why you're a member of the mafia. You are literally a monkey.*
Control Immune
Roleblock Immune
